column4: At T. Rowe Price  top Tesla funds offer split views
column5: BOSTON With a volatile chief executive and a potential breakthrough product starting production  Tesla Inc  is a challenging stock to hold.

column4: At T. Rowe Price  top Tesla funds offer split views
column5: BOSTON  Aug 21 With a volatile chief executive and a potential breakthrough product starting production  Tesla Inc is a challenging stock to hold.

column4: Morgan Stanley halts research coverage of Tesla  shares rise
column5: Brokerage Morgan Stanley  has suspended equity coverage on Tesla Inc   hinting that the U.S. bank may be doing business directly with the company as it explores options to go private  pushing the electric carmaker's shares up as much as 5 percent on Tuesday.

column4: UPDATE 3-Morgan Stanley halts research coverage of Tesla  shares rise

column4: Morgan Stanley stops research coverage of Tesla
column5: Aug 21 Brokerage Morgan Stanley has halted equity coverage on Tesla Inc  potentially a sign the U.S. bank may be doing business directly with the electric carmaker as it explores options to go private.

column4: Norway wealth fund allowed to stay on as investor if Tesla goes private
column5: OSLO Rules governing Norway's $1 trillion wealth fund would allow it to stay on as an investor in Tesla  if the electric carmaker goes private  its deputy CEO said on Tuesday.
